subject: Multiple Sclerosis
Hockey, Ice
Philanthropy
lead_paragraph: Josh Harding, now back on the ice at the Minnesota Wild’s training camp, spent the off-season establishing a charity benefiting M.S. patients struggling to afford medication and treatment.
snippet: Josh Harding, now back on the ice at the Minnesota Wild’s training camp, spent the off-season establishing a charity benefiting M.S. patients struggling to afford medication and treatment.
